  • Method Details

    • getPower

      public static int getPower(net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack)
      Get the power level of the given ItemStack.
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The item to check.
      Returns:
      The power this Mace currently has.

    • setPower

      public static void setPower(net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack, int power)
      Set the power level of the given ItemStack.
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The item to change.
      power - The new power level.

    • onPowerableItemItemRightClick

      public static boolean onPowerableItemItemRightClick(net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack, net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, int powerLevels, boolean onSneak)
      Should be called by powerable items on right click.
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The item stack, this will possibly have an updated power level.
      world - The world.
      player - The player
      powerLevels - The maximum power levels.
      onSneak - If the action should be executed for a sneaking player.
      Returns:
      If the power level was changed.

      Parameters:

      lines - The lines to add the information to.
